about_the_game:
Bend the rules of time to your whim to outsmart and out-think your opponents. A fun 4-player co-op strategy card-game which will leave you on the edge of your seat!

Background
An intricate battle in time is fought out over a course of rounds, as a multiplayer turn-based card game. Each turn you have the option to play a card until everyone passes, making for methodical calculations and daring gambits with friends near and far. Rounds are finished after every player has passed, then the stack plays out fastest to lowest. Then the spaces on the timelines play out their inherent effects. Time is bent and logical strategy is created in the moment depending on the game state. The depth is seen in the course of rounds you survive in, resulting in a collective effort to fight over abundant parts of the map while avoiding dangerous locations.

Features

  • Multiplayer, 2-4 Players.
  • Dynamic Board that changes each round.
  • Plan out how the future will unfold by creating rifts in time and deploying time bombs as future explosives.
  • Utilize futuristic technology such as time machines, rocketships, as well as cryogenic chambers.
  • Collect Busted Cards From Spaces In Time, use them to tilt the scales in your favor.
  • Tutorial and Rule help new players understand the fundamentals, as well as teach some more intricate and mind-bending strategies.
